title: You Had A Nightmare Related To Him, Right? (Part 2)
body:
You Had A Nightmare Related To Him, Right? (Part 2)

"I had nightmare because he has a unique physique?" Evan asked looking at Ava with a dumbstruck expression.

"Yeah" Ava nodded her head and said with a strange smile, "he has a unique physique called dream beauty physique. This physique does nothing other than making him more beautiful, and for some reason, most of the males who see him for the first time will have a nightmare. Well it can't be called a nightmare to be exact because there are always some people who have a different kind of taste"

'Dream beauty physique why do I feel like it's a name of a shabby pill instead of a unique physique' Evan was speechless after hearing Ava.

He never heard or read about a physique like this.

Then Evan thought about what Ava said in the end and remembered the dream he had last night and his mouth can't help but twitch.
